titles.title: Temporary Investment Tax Credit Restoration Act of 1993

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to encourage investments in new manufacturing and other productive equipment by providing a temporary investment tax credit to taxpayers who increase the amount of such investments.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H279)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/27/1993--Introduced. Temporary Investment Tax Credit Restoration Act of 1993 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an investment tax credit for manufacturing and other productive equipment for the period after December 31, 1987, and before January 1, 1993. Provides for determining such credit.
